hero.title: Smart restaurants run on Grubtech
hero.subtitle: We connect your restaurant systems - from online orders to POS to delivery - so everything runs smoother, faster, and smarter.

smbs.title: Small & Medium Businesses
smbs.subtitle: Tailored solutions for growing restaurants
smbs.description: Streamline operations and scale efficiently with our comprehensive restaurant management platform designed for small and medium businesses.

regional_chains.title: Regional Chains
regional_chains.subtitle: Unified management for multi-location operations
regional_chains.description: Manage multiple locations with centralized control, real-time synchronization, and comprehensive reporting across your regional chain.

global_chains.title: Global Chains
global_chains.subtitle: Enterprise-grade solutions for international operations
global_chains.description: Power your global restaurant operations with enterprise-grade technology, multi-market support, and advanced analytics.

dark_kitchens.title: Dark Kitchens
dark_kitchens.subtitle: Optimized for delivery-only operations
dark_kitchens.description: Maximize efficiency in your dark kitchen with specialized tools for delivery operations, virtual brands, and optimized workflows.

gonline.title: gOnline
gonline.subtitle: The simpler, faster way to manage your orders
gonline.description: Say goodbye to paper tickets and cook with precision. gOnline connects all your order channels into one unified system.

gonline_lite.title: gOnline Lite
gonline_lite.subtitle: Essential order management for small restaurants
gonline_lite.description: Perfect for small restaurants and cafes looking for essential order management without the complexity.

gdispatch.title: gDispatch
gdispatch.subtitle: Get orders out the door faster with real-time delivery coordination
gdispatch.description: Optimize your delivery operations with intelligent routing, real-time tracking, and seamless driver coordination.

gkds.title: gKDS
gkds.subtitle: Kitchen Display System for efficient order management
gkds.description: Transform your kitchen operations with our advanced Kitchen Display System designed for speed and accuracy.

gdata.title: gData
gdata.subtitle: Unlock powerful insights about your restaurant
gdata.description: Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive analytics, reporting, and insights about your restaurant operations.

pos_systems.title: POS Systems
pos_systems.description: Seamlessly integrate with leading POS systems to streamline your operations and reduce manual work.

delivery_platforms.title: Delivery Platforms
delivery_platforms.description: Connect with all major delivery platforms to manage orders from a single dashboard.

fulfillment.title: Fulfillment
fulfillment.description: Optimize your fulfillment operations with third-party logistics integration and smart routing.

erp_systems.title: ERP Systems
erp_systems.description: Integrate with enterprise resource planning systems for comprehensive business management.

about.title: About GrubTech
about.subtitle: Empowering restaurants with smart technology
about.mission: Our mission is to simplify restaurant operations and help businesses thrive in the digital age.
about.vision: To be the leading platform that connects all restaurant systems, making operations seamless and efficient.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A diverse team of experts passionate about restaurant technology and customer success.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded with the vision of simplifying restaurant operations, GrubTech has grown to serve thousands of restaurants worldwide.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Build the future of restaurant technology
careers.description: We're looking for talented individuals who are passionate about technology and want to make a difference in the restaurant industry.

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.description: We foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.

connect.title: Connect With Us
connect.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
connect.description: Ready to transform your restaurant operations? Let's talk about how GrubTech can help your business grow.
